scripts.test: npm run build:clean && npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:ts && npm run test:lint:eslint
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:unified && npm run test:unit:ods && npm run test:unit:everything-else
scripts.test:unit:ci: npm run test:unit:unified -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:ods:ci && npm run test:unit:everything-else -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js
scripts.test:unit:ods: npm run test:unit:ods:changequery:all && npm run test:unit:ods:postgresql:non-db && npm run test:unit:ods:ro:all && npm run test:unit:ods:relational && npm run test:unit:ods:sqlserver:all && npm run test:unit:odsapi
scripts.test:unit:ods:ci: npm run test:unit:ods:changequery:all -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:ods:postgresql:non-db -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:ods:ro:all -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:ods:relational -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:ods:sqlserver:non-db -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js && npm run test:unit:odsapi -- --ci  --config ./jest.ci-config.js
scripts.test:unit:ods:changequery:all: npm run test:unit:ods:changequery && npm run test:unit:ods:changequery:postgresql && npm run test:unit:ods:changequery:sqlserver
scripts.test:unit:ods:postgresql:setup-db: npx dropdbjs metaed_integration_tests --password=docker && npx createdbjs metaed_integration_tests --password=docker && psql -d metaed_integration_tests -U postgres
scripts.test:unit:ods:ro:all: npm run test:unit:ods:ro && npm run test:unit:ods:ro:postgresql && npm run test:unit:ods:ro:sqlserver
scripts.test:unit:ods:sqlserver:all: npm run test:unit:ods:sqlserver && npm run test:unit:ods:sqlserver:db && npm run test:unit:ods:sqlserver:non-db
scripts.test:unit:ods:sqlserver: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 ts-node packages/metaed-plugin-edfi-ods-sqlserver/test/database/InitializeOdsIntegrationTestDatabase.ts && npx jest packages/metaed-plugin-edfi-ods-sqlserver -i
